item.title: Modern Problems Require Modern Solutions
item.description: Recently I posted about my experience with the longest work from home (posted in Bahasa) I ever had so far. The biggest challenge about working from home in the internet era is the internet connection itself. I often got a bad connection in the middle of the meeting, that not good especially since I’m the host in a meeting, not only once but in “daily standup meeting”. Yes, you can see daily in the quoted word.
